name: rough-skin

effect.sun_moon: Inflicts only 1/16 of the attacker's maximum HP in damage.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts only 1/16 of the attacker's maximum HP in damage.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts only 1/16 of the attacker's maximum HP in damage.

short_effect: Damages attacking Pokémon for 1/8 their max HP on contact.

flavor_text.sun_moon: This Pokémon inflicts damage with its rough skin to the attacker on contact.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: This Pokémon inflicts damage with its rough skin to the attacker on contact.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: This Pokémon inflicts damage with its rough skin to the attacker on contact.
